"REVELATIONS," Part 1 (of 6),2007,8
The final confrontation between Ghost Rider and Lucifer begins here! Ghost Rider, now back in control after Johnny has (once again) proven himself to be...not so good at it, has begun his brutal final march toward Lucifer's ultimate destruction. But should the fate of the mortal world-and possibly the immortal world-be entrusted to a vengeful spirit bonded to the soul of an ex-carnival performer? Heaven doesn't think so.
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
